description: Decimal expansion of cube root of 6.
comments: Diameter of a sphere with volume Pi. - _Omar E. Pol_, Aug 09 2012
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
prog: (PARI) { default(realprecision, 20080); x=6^(1/3); for (n=1, 20000, d=floor(x); x=(x-d)*10; write("b005486.txt", n, " ", d)); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, May 07 2009
crossrefs: Cf. A002949 = Continued fraction. - _Harry J. Smith_, May 07 2009
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
